content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 2, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 2, West Bromwich Albion 1.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (West Bromwich Albion) is shown the yellow card.
Andy Carroll (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Grzegorz Krychowiak (West Bromwich Albion).
Offside, West Bromwich Albion. Kieran Gibbs tries a through ball, but Craig Dawson is caught offside.
Goal!  West Ham United 2, West Bromwich Albion 1. Andy Carroll (West Ham United) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marko Arnautovic.
Attempt missed. Oliver Burke (West Bromwich Albion) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt blocked. Salomón Rondón (West Bromwich Albion) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by James McClean with a cross.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Craig Dawson.
